segments.text: Bill , I have received the admission letter from Cambridge University !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about you ? Have you got any news from university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . But I am going to apply for some vocational schools . I like fashion design and want to study it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am glad you can study something you really like !
segments.speaker: S1
